page.title: 18ELPHINSTONE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: THERE ARE ONLY THREE FULL TIME TEACHERS INCLUDING THE HEAD TEACHER. A TEACHER COMES EVERY WEDNESDAY TO TEACH PRIMARY 6/7. ANOTHER TEACHER COMES EVERY MONDAY AND WEDNESDAY.THESE PART-TIME TEACHERS ARE RELIEF AND SPECIAL SUBJECT TEACHERS. WE DO MATHS, LANGUAGE, ART, MUSIC AND PROJECTS. ALL THE CLASSES GO TRIPS EVERY TERM. WE HAVE A SERVICE EVERY SECOND THURSDAY. THE SCHOOL HAS JUST BEEN REDECORATED. ALL THE CLASS ROOMS HAVE CURTAINS ON THE WINDOWS.WE HAVE PLANTS IN EACH ROOM. WE HAVE A LOVELY BIG PLAYGROUND. THERE ARE ABOUT 50 CHILDREN IN OUR SCHOOL DIVIDED INTO THREE CLASSES ACCORDING TO AGE. IN SUCH A SMALL SCHOOL IT IS POSSIBLE TO HAVE A VERY FRIENDLY AND INFORMAL ATMOSPHERE. WE ALL WORK AND PLAY HAPPILY TOGETHER.
